mapper.select: select C.cart_code, C.cart_amount, P.pro_num, P.pro_name, P.pro_price, P.pro_discount, P.pro_img from(select cart_code, pro_num, mbs_id, cart_amount from cart_tbl where mbs_id=#{mbs_id}) C inner join product_tbl P on C.pro_num = P.pro_num
mapper.insert: merge into cart_tbl c using dual on (c.mbs_id=#{mbs_id} and c.pro_num=#{pro_num}) when matched then update set cart_amount = cart_amount + #{cart_amount} when not matched then insert (cart_code, pro_num, mbs_id, cart_amount) values(seq_cart_code.NEXTVAL, #{pro_num}, #{mbs_id}, #{cart_amount})
mapper.delete: delete from cart_tbl where pro_num=#{pro_num} and mbs_id=#{mbs_id}
